â“ Frequently Asked Questions:
ğŸ“Œ How does is it work?
ğŸ’¡ Catch a Flat is a Chrome extension that refreshes the immoscout24 page in the background and looks for new flats for you. Once a new flat appears - you will see a notification, click to it to be redirected to the flat.

ğŸ“Œ Can I use it for free?
ğŸ’¡ Yes, extension is available as a free Chrome extension

ğŸ“Œ How do I install?
ğŸ’¡ To install Catch A Flat, go to the Chrome Web Store and select "Add to Chrome". It will be added to your browser, and you can start using it.

ğŸ“Œ Why not us ImmoScout App Notifications or Telegram bots?
ğŸ’¡ Catch a Flat is FASTEST way to see a new post, the delay is maximum 20 seconds, while ImmoScout24 notifications have 1-3 minutes delay, Telegram Bots have 3-5 minutes delay. 

ğŸ“Œ Does it work for any other websites?
ğŸ’¡ At the moment it only works for immobilienscout24.de, but if you would like to have other websites added, drop us a website name at 'catchaflatlabs@gmail.com'

ğŸ“Œ Why I cannot see any notifications?
ğŸ’¡ You might have disabled notifications from Chrome browser in your OS. Enable them back and notifications will work again. Check our Troubleshooting guide here: https://tinyurl.com/catchaflat

ğŸ“Œ Is my privacy protected when using extension?
ğŸ’¡ Absolutely! Extension operates locally within your browser, ensuring the privacy and security of your personal information. It does not collect or store any user data.
